title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when selecting SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText emits a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior is unexpected.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI, ControlExampleText emits a beep sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beep sound.
EB: ControlExampleText should not emit a beep sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. Clicking on other buttons should not trigger the beep sound.
SR:
1. Launch the ControlExampleText application.
2. Select SWT.MULTI.
3. Observe the beep sound.
4. Click on other buttons.
5. Observe the beep sound.
